thread.title: Explosion at nuclear power plant near English Channel with injuries reported
thread.title_full: Explosion at nuclear power plant near English Channel with injuries reported

author: Anthony Bond
title: Explosion at nuclear power plant near English Channel with injuries reported
text:
Explosion at nuclear power plant near English Channel with injuries reported The blast was reported at the Flamanville nuclear plant at 10 am this morning Share The blast has been reported at Flamanville plant in France (Photo: AFP) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
An explosion has taken place this morning at a nuclear power plant near the English Channel. 
The blast was reported at the Flamanville nuclear plant in France at 10 am. 
Rescuers are being sent to the scene and there are reports of injuries. 
Fireman have reported an explosion and fire at the site. 
We'll be bringing you the very latest updates, pictures and video on this breaking news story. 
For the latest news and breaking news visit Mirror.co.uk/news .
